A brief survey (historical and political) of the life and reign of Henry the III, King of England dedicated to His Most Sacred Majesty. Cotton, Robert, Sir, 1571-1631.
[4], 7-32 p.
Printed for James Vade ..., London : 1680.
Attributed to Robert Bruce Cotton. cf. NUC pre-1956, v. 124, p. 504. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
